rows.label: tev001295_MSG0001
rows.name: Hey, [ST:playername ].[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001295_MSG0002
rows.name: I was just staring up at the Ma-non ship.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001295_MSG0003
rows.name: Isn't it incredible?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001295_MSG0004
rows.name:
I wonder how the Ma-non ever discovered that
technology.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001295_MSG0005
rows.name:
That thing is so huge! And it isn't even flying—
it just kinda...floats.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001295_MSG0006
rows.name:
It makes virtually no noise, and runs off of an
extremely clean energy source.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001295_MSG0007
rows.name:
With everyone’s help, I was able to finally complete
the Skell flight module...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001295_MSG0008
rows.name:
but us humans are still a ways off from being able
to match the Ma-non on the technology front.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001295_MSG0009
rows.name:
I've seen a lot of Ganglion tech that impressed me,
too, you know.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001295_MSG0010
rows.name:
Like that Zu Pharg, I think it was called?
Yeah, we're nowhere near being able to add flight
capabilities to such massive machines.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001295_MSG0011
rows.name:
I'd love to pay a visit to the labs at Meredith & Co.
or Candid & Credible. I bet I could learn a few things.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001295_JNK0010
rows.name: Encourage

rows.label: tev001295_SEL0011
rows.name: Tell Lin that her inventions will top theirs one day.

rows.label: tev001295_JNK0020
rows.name: Accompany

rows.label: tev001295_SEL0021
rows.name:
Tell Lin that you'd like to visit
the arms manufacturers with her.

rows.label: tev001295_MSG0012
rows.name: Heh. At this rate, that's not likely at all.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001295_MSG0013
rows.name:
It could take decades or even centuries to replicate
those technologies.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001295_MSG0014
rows.name:
And while we're playing catch-up, the Ma-non and
Ganglion will develop newer and better things.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001295_MSG0015
rows.name: So to help speed things along, even if only a little...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001295_MSG0016
rows.name:
I need to learn all I can while we have experts here
who are able to teach us.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001295_MSG0017
rows.name:
Once we catch up, hopefully we can start putting our
own human spins on their technology.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001295_MSG0018
rows.name:
I'm sure it'd be fun to have you come along,
but it's probably not worth the effort.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001295_MSG0019
rows.name:
I've made tons of requests to these guys, but they
always turn me down.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001295_MSG0020
rows.name:
They may be making equipment for BLADE,
but they're still corporations.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001295_MSG0021
rows.name: They're not about to start sharing their trade secrets.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001295_MSG0022
rows.name:
And yeah, the Ma-non work with us, but that doesn't
include supplying us with their core technologies...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001295_MSG0023
rows.name: Anyway, I hope I'm not worrying you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001295_MSG0024
rows.name:
I haven't been working on this stuff night and day or
anything. I'm taking some occasional time off.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001295_MSG0025
rows.name:
Elma's been on my case about it. She says I'll burn
myself out if I don't relax more.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001295_JNK0030
rows.name: Suggest

rows.label: tev001295_SEL0031
rows.name:
Tell Lin to try and do only fun
things on her next day off.

rows.label: tev001295_JNK0040
rows.name: Defend

rows.label: tev001295_SEL0041
rows.name: Tell Lin it's fine as long as she's enjoying herself.

rows.label: tev001295_MSG0026
rows.name: What, for the entire DAY?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001295_MSG0027
rows.name: ...Huh. That does sound pretty relaxing.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001295_MSG0028
rows.name:
But I'm not sure if I could be away from my machines
for so long.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001295_MSG0029
rows.name:
Like, if I went to the park, there'd be cars driving
around, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001295_MSG0030
rows.name:
Or if I went to see a movie, who knows what sort of
fantastical technology might come up in the story?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001295_MSG0031
rows.name:
And then I'd find myself wondering what makes them
tick, and how I could improve them...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001295_MSG0032
rows.name:
And then? BLAMMO! I'm back at work.
Happens every time.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001295_MSG0033
rows.name:
I thought that once I completed the flight module,
I'd be okay not working on anything for a while.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001295_MSG0034
rows.name:
But completing it was so thrilling that it made me
want to start working on upgrades.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001295_MSG0035
rows.name:
Honestly, just having this conversation makes me want
to run home and grab a wrench![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001295_MSG0036
rows.name:
Anyway, I'm gonna go check on the Skells.
See you back at the barracks![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001295_MSG0037
rows.name: Aw, thanks for saying that.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001295_MSG0038
rows.name: I love tinkering with machines. It's a ton of fun.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001295_MSG0039
rows.name:
My designs don't work out most of the time,
but I can always try again, as much as I want.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001295_MSG0040
rows.name:
I think Elma's worried about me getting so obsessed
with my fiddling that I stop taking care of myself.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001295_MSG0041
rows.name:
And when I say something like, "I'll only do it for an
hour today," five hours go by before I even realize it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001295_MSG0042
rows.name:
Honestly, just having this conversation makes me want
to run home and grab a wrench![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001295_MSG0043
rows.name:
Anyway, I'm gonna go check on the Skells.
See you back at the barracks![ST:wait ]
